summary: The module supplies a collection of minimal Lightning data modules, model classes, a simple neural network, and synthetic dataset implementations (including random, dictionary-based, and iterable variants) designed for rapid prototyping, testing, and debugging of Lightningâ€‘PyTorch training pipelines.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly set up and validate Lightning workflows without the overhead of real data or complex models, thereby accelerating development, unit testing, and educational demos.
